role: Software Engineer · Young Leaders · Brand Ambassador
impact_bullets: Owned end-to-end delivery for a confidential internal project, from build to deployment.
Planned and facilitated UAT, including script creation and stakeholder sessions.
Managed incidents and user enablement through training and ongoing support.
Scanned 88 IS216 projects using OWASP ZAP for dynamic analysis.
Executed commercial DAST scans and performed static analysis on the same codebases.
Contributed findings to research on integrating security in web programming courses.
Automated conversion of 150M+ rows with 3B+ data points into AWS DynamoDB.
Built API trials for three vendors to evaluate adoption viability.
Implemented data sorting and voyage analysis for trend identification.
Built an enterprise analytics portal providing 15 key data points for decision-making.
Delivered a ship agency system supporting 160+ emails/hour.
Enhanced vessel information for 230+ vessels via API integrations.
Resolved 20+ bugs to improve site stability within two weeks.
Created an overview page for 250 applicants’ job status.
Built a job listing dashboard covering 500+ companies.
Published 1–2 articles per week for a 1.5M+ member audience.
Covered mobile software updates and product insights.
